apiKey.title: Enter your FOSSA API key
apiKey.description: If you are using a Push-Only token, you won't get detailed reports in the build log. You can retrieve your FOSSA API key from https://app.fossa.com/account/settings/integrations/api_tokens

verifyonpreview.title: Fail Preview Builds?
verifyonpreview.description: Stop the build if a policy violation is detected during a preview build. May delay builds by tens of seconds awaiting scan results.

verifyonrelease.title: Fail Release Builds?
verifyonrelease.description: Stop the build if a policy violation is detected during a release build. May delay builds by tens of seconds awaiting scan results.
